description_txt: stated on June 11, 2018 in a tweet:
quote_txt: A Chinese proverb says, "Those who say it can not be done, should not interrupt those doing it."

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2018 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Since taking office, we have enacted more than $8 billion in cumulative tax relief."

quote_txt: Says May 2018 marked the 401st straight month of global temperatures exceeding the 20th century average.

quote_txt: On separating families at the border.
